CustomField.formula: AND(NOT(ISBLANK(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_JobSLAInHours__c)), IF((FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_JobSLAInHours__c = 36 && TODAY() >= DATEVALUE((DueDate + 1))), true, IF((FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_JobSLAInHours__c = 37 && TODAY() >= DATEVALUE((DueDate + (120/24)))), true , IF((FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_JobSLAInHours__c = 38 && TODAY() >= DATEVALUE((DueDate + (274/24)))), true, IF((FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_JobSLAInHours__c = 39 && TODAY() >= DATEVALUE((DueDate + (672/24)))),true, false)))))
CustomField.label: Reject Bundle
